name: DEPHTS OF THE RAFT SURVIVE
description:
You're on an uninhabited island. There is only waste and wreck on the island. Get in to the lifeboat paddle to the appointed are and start a new life and try to survive this shipwrecked situation.
Collect the wastes from the water and make them useful objects, weapons and build a house. Hunt for sharks for their flesh and of self-defense! It's a big challenge, but it will succeed with patience.



Features:


⁃Collectable items
-Inventory
-Useful tools
-Construction and hunting opportunity
